title: White House Physician: President is "Doing Very Well"
description: President Trump's medical team, including his physician Commander Sean Conley, provided an update from Walter Reed National Military Medical Center in Bethesda, Maryland, on the president's condition since testing positive for COVID-19. They said they were "extremely happy" with the president's progress, given he is within 72-hours of his diagnosis. When asked if the president has been on oxygen, Commander Conley said "he is not on oxygen right now."
